> > > Sigma Mod Expansions > > > | I love playing with mods and I usually like to tweak some features.

So I have put together some little expansion packs for a few of those mods.

I hope you will enjoy playing with them as much as I enjoyed making them. | > | --- | > > > > > > > > * * * > > > > > > > *Sigma: OPM Recolor* > > > > > | *This mod changes the colors of the OPM Gas Giants:Sarnus, Urlum and Neidon are now light blue, red and orange.This way, they will have a completely different color compared to their analoguesjust like Jool compared to Jupiter* | > | --- | > > > > | *[![vBQOsVy.png](http://i.imgur.com/vBQOsVy.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/135895)* | > | --- | > > > *Sigma: OPM Tilt* > > > > > | *This mod gives Urlum (OPM) a 90° axial tilt.Rings and moons are tweaked to be consistent with the planet's tilt.* | > | --- | > > > > | [*!\[RnkCokt.png\](http://i.imgur.com/RnkCokt.png)*](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/135899) | > | --- | > > > *Sigma: PluronKhato* > > > > > | *This mod will add a Kerbal analogue to the Pluto-Charon system.If used in combination with [Sigma Binary](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/127820) it will be a binary system.* | > | --- | > > > > | more similar to Venus.If present, clouds will be recolored as well.* | > | --- | > > > > | *[![RmheK7W.png?1](http://i.imgur.com/RmheK7W.png?1)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/136075)* | > | --- | > > > *Sigma: Jool Recolor* > > > > > | *This mod changes the color of Jool to make it more similar to Jupiter.If present, clouds will be recolored as well.* | > | --- | > > > > | versions of the stock [Comms DTS-M1](http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Comms_DTS-M1)because color coding is fun!If RemoteTech is installed these antennas can be usedto set up a comm system around Jool.* | > | --- | > > > > | *[![kM3aK75.png](http://i.imgur.com/kM3aK75.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/136732)* | > | --- | > > > *Sigma: OuterSpaceComms* > > > > > | *A set of 3 antennas designed to probe deep into outer space.If you have one or more mods that add planets in orbit outside Joolyou will be able to reach them with this set of dishes.* | > | --- | > > > systems.* | > | --- | > > > > | *[![fRCikDR.png](http://i.imgur.com/fRCikDR.png)](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php/topic/115114-/)* | > | --- | > > > *Sigma * *D↕MENSI**↻**NS* > > > > > Kopernicus is a wonderful mod, and there are a lot of great planets out there.

This mod will rearrange bodies from many different planet packs

- No axial tilt, but planet and its moons rotate around their axis properly, or

- Cosmetic Axial Tilt, but the planet rotation needs to be set to zero and the navball won't show you the correct direction of the cardinal axis (prograde, retrograde, radial and normal markers will be fine tho.

> Sigma, I'm working on making a patch that moves Plock instead of deleting and replacing it in addition to doing some other stuff.

Pluron is actually using the same model and textures as Plock, and will be updated alongside Plock.

The only reason why I changed the name is that Capt told me he didn't think my vision of the pluto/charon analogue was enough stock like, so changing the name was my way of putting some distance between OPM and PluronKharon.

I still don't know if I will change the names when the OPM version of Charon is released.

Anyway you are free to change the name if you want, I just wanted to explain why I made that choice for now.

--edit--

I also wanted to say that "Plock" as a name always felt like not a good fit to me. All the other planets have their name derived from both the latin and greek god, Plock is the only one that does not fit in that scheme.

Pludes would have been a more fitting choice, but I don't know if I like it or hate it as a name ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
